# bane

𓃀 𓇋 𓈖 𓅪 ⲃⲱⲛ buno ≠ bon bueno
𓃀 𓇋 𓈖 𓅪 πονηρός ponērós : evil
𓃀 𓇋 𓈖 𓅪 bane bad, ruin bile übel evil mbal mal malauns
𓃀 𓇋 𓈖 𓏏 𓅪 bãdfoul بدکار badkâr böse paha@fin
𓐍 𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓏮 𓏴 𓅪 bandit@caravan?
𓐍 𓃀 𓆓 bad: displeasure, hate …
𓐍 𓃀 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀐 𓏥||carnage|kabyt: kaputt
𓐍 𓃀 𓅡 𓄿 𓌻 𓅪||destroy|kaput-mach
𓅱 𓃀 𓈖 𓏌 𓌙 𓉐 wound bing 病 bāo 勹
𓅱 𓃀 𓇱 wound ⇔ bent
𓅱 𓃀 𓈖 𓇳 levant

𓃀 𓇋 𓈖 𓅪 | πονηρός ponērós @ punic phoenicia Φοινίκη Phoiníkē phoenix Punt

original full reading

𓃀 might connect to bad böse via pod 𓐍 𓃀 𓆓

internal etymology

𓃀 𓇋 𓈖 𓅪 might be internally explainable as "wandering of", "tresspassing" … via verbal forms of 𓃀

association with 'dirty' inner planets?

𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 𓆞 | bad smell | paedor "stench" <> fish feist <> փիծ pʿic, “dirty, impure” <> spot "reek" 𓃀 𓅱 𓏏 𓆜 𓏥 | ⇔ butt | the butt ⲧⲉⲃⲧ tebt tepi@Brazil (Macro-Jê) თევზი tevzi ⇔ tadpole

Mercury as killer of Osiris was definately viewed negatively, but Venus? 𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 Venus ≈ phoenix 𓃀 _? 𓅣 Venus Ba'ah

other words and associations

𓈋 𓏴 𓅪 <> devote dumm evil

𓇋 𓆛 𓈖 𓂧 | misery | ⲉⲃⲓⲏⲛ a poor, miserable, wretched (person) ⇔ ⲙⲉⲧⲉⲃⲓⲏⲛ f. misery

binge "Gelage"
bing 病 pain/sick ⇔ cold 冰 "bien=cool" ⇔ 炳 bling!
